Name: Signs of Birth
About the game: Signs of Birth is old school rogue-like 2.5D Shooting. The feature of this game is like following. - Rogue like shooting: random generation map; cannot continue when you die; item hunting - A plenty of enemies; a thousand of enemies would attack you at a time; - Simple operation; WASD+F+Inventory - Stage less; you have to continue running a stage to goal. - Shoot automatically; you can only control the character movement. - No save point. Signs of Birth is currently a distance running game with minimalistic gimmics and roguelite elements. All you can do is trial to run on long wooden bridge to reach final goal and get as many items as possible for the reincarnation.
